About

Let Me Introduce Myself

My name is Joshua Haug, and this is my personal website. Some quick facts about me…

  • Attended Pepperdine University in Malibu, California
  • Majored in Mathematics / Computer Science

Contact Info

If you’d like to contact me, there are a few ways of doing it:

  • Send an email to josh.haug55@gmail.com
  • Encrypt your message with my public key
  • Fork me on GitHub
  • Connect on LinkedIn
  • Be my friend in real life

What I Look Like

If you’d like to befriend me in real life, it will help to know what I look like. This is me on a hike in Malibu: I’ve been told I look like Bo Burnham and Ellen DeGeneres.

Website Info

I generate the HTML files from markdown using Jekyll and host them on GitHub. If you’d like to learn more, I wrote a blog post about making this site.

Thanks for reading!
